text.section:
It is the policy of the State to:
strive to create a nurturing climate for the arts in the State and join with private patrons, institutions, and professional organizations concerned with the arts;
promote the role of the arts in the life of the residents of the State; and
ensure that the arts play an ever more significant part in the residents' welfare and educational experience.

The General Assembly intends that the activities of the State to carry out the policy set forth in subsection (b) of this section:
encourage and assist artistic expression; and
not limit freedom of artistic expression, which is essential for the well-being of the arts.
